title: It's been 4 years since honor rolls have been posted. I think student's that achieve the high standard of all A's and A's & B's should be recognized. When are they going to be posted again?
text:
We appreciate the interest in recognizing the hard-working and high-achieving students of our area. We are now in the process of reviewing and improving how we post such community content as academic awards and non-varsity sports accomplishments. We'll be talking about how we can make honor roll information available on our website or elsewhere.



Thanks for your interest and for reading StarNewsOnline!
